channel.title: TaiwanPlus - Latest News
channel.description: Your source of news, culture, and infotainment from Taiwan, a voice of freedom in Asia.

item.title: Legislature Passes Resolution To Freeze Electricity Prices
item.description: Opposition parties the KMT and TPP have joined forces to pass a resolution to freeze electricity prices. The resolution is non-binding on the government however and a planned 11% r

item.title: Taiwan's High Court Upholds Prison Sentence for Chinese Sand Dredger Captain
item.description: A Chinese ship captain's nearly 2-year prison sentence was upheld by Taiwan's High Court, after he was found guilty of illegally dredging sand near the Penghu Islands, an activity

item.title: Clashes, Standoffs in South China Sea as Global Powers Vie for Influence

item.title: Analysis: How Taiwan Deals With 'Enormous' Amounts of E-Waste
item.description: As a major tech hub, Taiwan's electronic manufacturing produces a lot of e-waste. We speak to Armin Ibitz, associate professor at the Wen Zao Ursuline University, on what can be do
